name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Arctic Strike
name_original: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Arctic Strike
description:
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Arctic Strike is an action-shooter game developed by Ubisoft Paris. It came out on 17-07-2012. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Arctic Strike is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
